page.title: 04Dedham Shire Horse Centre
page.content: The Shire Horse Centre is in East Lane.On show are sheep, peacocks, rabbits, baby horses and of course about eight Shire Horses.There are rides on trailers. But of course you have to pay Â£1 to get in. Pheasants and peacocks are kept in a cages in the grounds.Sometimes you can see some of the rabbits in their hutches.You can go for lovely walks in the fields and have a picnic.You can look around the stables.There is a harness room with displays of brasses,a beautiful old caravan which a gypsy lived in.It is very exiting and people come from miles around to have a look at it,and to buy their souvenirs.
